description:
A white snake becomes a daughter.  Two snails cook dinner for a pair of brothers.  A blue tengu and a red tengu get in a fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tanishi no Shimai / Shirohebi no Musume / Ao Tengu to Aka Tengu
The Pond Snail Sisters / The White Snake Girl / The Blue Tengu and the Red Tengu
たにしの姉妹 / 白蛇の娘 / 青天狗と赤天狗
